snippet: Doctors have turned to a number of antibiotic treatments in an urgent attempt to curb the spread of the infection, people familiar with Fells’s treatment said.
abstract: New York Giants tight end Daniel Fells remains hospitalized with methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus; Giants have described situation as serious.
lead_paragraph: Doctors have turned to a number of antibiotic treatments in an urgent attempt to curb the spread of the infection, people familiar with Fells’s treatment said.

headline.main: Giants’ Daniel Fells Still Being Treated for MRSA
headline.print_headline: Giant With Foot Infection Faces an Urgent Situation
